name: Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Petitioner, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC. and Charles F. Damm, Inc., Respondents

parties: Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Petitioner, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC. and Charles F. Damm, Inc., Respondents.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 44 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
508 A.2d 550
Marion QUINN, Executrix of the Estate of James Russell Quinn, Deceased, Petitioner, v. HOOVER & STRONG, INC. and Charles F. Damm, Inc., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 20, 1986.
